verses.verse: And he said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Come up <S%H5927><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, you and Aaron <S%H175><s%>, Nadab <S%H5070><s%>, and Abihu <S%H30><s%>, and seventy <S%H7657><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and worship <S%H7812><s%> you afar off <S%H7350><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> alone shall come near <S%H5066><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: but they shall not come near <S%H5066><s%>; neither shall the people <S%H5971><s%> go up with him <S%H5927><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5608><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and all the judgments <S%H4941><s%>: and all the people <S%H5971><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> with one <S%H259><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, All the words <S%H1697><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has said <S%H1696><s%> will we do <S%H6213><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> wrote <S%H3789><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and rose up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> under the hill <S%H2022><s%>, and twelve pillars <S%H4676><s%>, according to the twelve <S%H8147><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And he sent <S%H7971><s%> young men <S%H5288><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which offered <S%H5927><s%> burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, and sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings <S%H2077><s%> of oxen <S%H6499><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> half <S%H2677><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> it in basins <S%H101><s%>; and half <S%H2677><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> he sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And he took <S%H3947><s%> the book <S%H5612><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%>, and read <S%H7121><s%> in the audience <S%H241><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>: and they said <S%H559><s%>, All that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has said <S%H1696><s%> will we do <S%H6213><s%>, and be obedient <S%H8085><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%>, and sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> it on the people <S%H5971><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Behold the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%>, which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has made <S%H3772><s%> with you concerning all these words <S%H1697><s%>.
Then went up <S%H5927><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and Aaron <S%H175><s%>, Nadab <S%H5070><s%>, and Abihu <S%H30><s%>, and seventy <S%H7657><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>:

And they saw <S%H7200><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and there was under his feet <S%H7272><s%> as it were a paved <S%H3840><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> of a sapphire stone <S%H5601><s%>, and as it were the body <S%H6106><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> in his clearness <S%H2892><s%>.

And upon the nobles <S%H678><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> he laid <S%H7971><s%> not his hand <S%H3027><s%>: also they saw <S%H2372><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, and did eat <S%H398><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Come up <S%H5927><s%> to me into the mountain <S%H2022><s%>, and be there <S%H5414><s%>: and I will give you tablets <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%>, and a law <S%H8451><s%>, and commandments <S%H4687><s%> which I have written <S%H3789><s%>; that you may teach them <S%H3384><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%>, and his minister <S%H8334><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>: and Moses <S%H4872><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> into the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto the elders <S%H2205><s%>, stay <S%H3427><s%> you here <S%H2088><s%> for us <S%H7725><s%>, until we come again unto you <S%H175><s%>: and, behold, Aaron and Hur <S%H2354><s%> are with you <S%H4310><s%>: if any man <S%H1167><s%> have any matters <S%H1697><s%> to do <S%H1167><s%>, let him come unto them <S%H5066><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> into the mountain <S%H2022><s%>, and a cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> the mountain <S%H2022><s%>.

And the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> lived <S%H7931><s%> upon mountain <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, and the cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> it six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>: and the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> he called <S%H7121><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the cloud <S%H6051><s%>.

And the sight <S%H4758><s%> of the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was like devouring <S%H398><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> on the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H935><s%> into the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the cloud <S%H6051><s%>, and gat him up <S%H5927><s%> into the mountain <S%H2022><s%>: and Moses <S%H4872><s%> was in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights <S%H3915><s%>.
